original_text: And from the time that the regular burnt offering is taken away and the abomination that makes desolate is set up, there shall be 1,290 days.
korean_text: 매일 드리는 제사를 폐하며 멸망하게 할 가증한 것을 세울 때부터 천이백구십 일을 지낼 것이요

sentences.original_text: the regular burnt offering is taken away
and the abomination that makes desolate is set up
